feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed that sometimes a series was incorrectly detected as anime when importing from trakt (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a483117665ce2ec22be5734021bee9cecc8b1192)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.2...v0.19.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.4
entry.content:
Features

  • Added pagination with infinite scrolling to media list page for both grid and table layout (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e70d7be51545c03daeb3dd89abde4ce2f961522d)
  • Added better looking filters to media list page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/66d2831f9f9c90d807e3238b4c99e641e5f16277)
  • Added "add to list" button on media cards #333 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c5b250a1dfdfe3f38527d25355cefd53c3b8edad)
  • Added a star icon with rating on media cards (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1a9b999359138bc0bc385c02c50d180e02b2dd3d)

Screenshots from demo instance

Fixes

  • Fixed can't add manual entries #344 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/9775a95a37df5da361dee5900eae90d52635700d)

Maintenance

  • Bump django-select2 from 8.2.3 to 8.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/338
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.10 to 7.6.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/339
  • Bump ruff from 0.9.4 to 0.9.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/342
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.11 to 7.6.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/346
  • Bump fakeredis from 2.26.2 to 2.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/345

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.3...v0.19.4

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed IGDB token not updating properly #348 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/bfaf4cd12590659f5159decc31df58208868ed41)

Other

  • Optimized data export function (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/02b9fb310a5fb27c470f0f2a4f64eddfd83777e2)
  • Updated data export UI (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/9c509ea87b0b715bcb4365d098ba944b1f823715)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.4...v0.19.5

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.6
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed problem with unimported media when importing from SIMKL caused by completed TV shows with no watched episodes marked. #351 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2e1d762240d872b7eec8fc2bc385fcc6d4d1abe5)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.5...v0.19.6

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.7
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where creating a season could sometimes fail due to recursive creation of TV shows and their seasons (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/f43428095b6437e3876ec5595b045498241704c5)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.19.6...v0.19.7
